content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 tablespoon mini semisweet chocolate chips" )

content.text: 0) In a medium bowl, stir together the oats, flour, baking soda and brown sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@21:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oats"@35:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "flour"@45:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking soda"@52:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "brown sugar"@68:79 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Cut in the shortening until the mixture resembles cornmeal.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Cut in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the shortening"@10:24 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until the mixture resembles cornmeal"@25:61 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) There should be no lumps of shortening left.
3) Measure 1/2 cup of the mixture into re-sealable bags or containers for storage.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Measure"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "1/2 cup of the mixture"@11:33 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-3-0 "re-sealable bags or containers"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:prp ( "for storage"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 5) To make the cookies, empty one package of the mix into a bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "empty"@24:29 / AC
		:ppt ( "one package of the mix"@30:52 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "a bowl"@58:64 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-5-0 "To make the cookies"@3:22 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Stir in 2 teaspoons of water, 1 tablespoon of raisins and 1 tablespoon of mini semisweet chocolate chips.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "2 teaspoons of water"@11:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "1 tablespoon of raisins"@33:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "1 tablespoon of mini semisweet chocolate chips"@61:107 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Mix well and shape teaspoonfuls of dough into small balls.
8) Place balls on an ungreased cookie sheet and flatten with the buttered bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
9) Follow you oven's instructions for baking.
